## Status 
Minimum VPX Standalone build: 10.8.0-1989-a764013
| Playfield | Controls | Backglass | DMD | ROM Required | FPS | 
|-----------|----------|-----------|-----|--------------|-----|
| :white_check_mark: | :white_check_mark: | :white_check_mark: | :x: | :white_check_mark: | 60 |

---

## Instructions

- Copy the contents of this repo folder to your USB drive
- Add your personalized launcher.elf and rename it to `vpx-jpmystic.elf`
- Download the table and directb2s versions listed above, extract (if necessary) and copy them into `vpx-jpmystic` folder
- Place ROM zip file into `vpx-jpmystic/pinmame/roms` folder. DO NOT UNZIP!
- Make sure `(.vpx)` `(.direct2b2s)` and `(.ini)` are all named the same.
